content:
17 Don't forget... [H1-B] holders in USA also posted 4 hours ago by BeAZotch 0 comments award share report block ... bring their spouses and under 21 unmarried children [H-4] . These women and men also work their own (definitely not skilled) jobs when they are here. They attend our schools, use medical facilities  and may travel in and out of the country at will.
So the Battery Guru's wives are scanning your groceries while making more babies to attend our schools, use medical facilities  travel in and out of the country at will. p.s. 85% of my 'colleagues' [MAJOR bank code devs] are Indian.
p.s.s: A few mos. ago a pack of 3 of them I'd never met sauntered up to my cubicle to interrogate me on my 'views on Indians'. - culture, what I think of India, etc. Usually the Indians here are unassuming - but these three looked like they had an agenda. Flash fwd, lots of layoffs last  week. My take is they  were farming for who to keep around.
